As the turrets continue to blast everything they can that has a 
Predacon energy signature, the furious looking robot makes his way 
slowly out of the base. His talons scrape on the base's metallic floor 
and his light grows stronger with every passing moment.

Tyrael: This, Predacons, might be my last stand. But if it is so, it 
shall be yours as well! I WILL ERADICATE YOU ALL!

He rises in the air, fast, almost as a comet, and throws two light 
shards at Skulletron, one at Waspinator and one at Quickstrike.

----------------------------------------------------------------

A few kilometers away, Vlad sees the first signs of combat as faint 
explosions.

Vlad: Come, lady, we are needed. Even though we are Clan Warriors, I 
gave my word that I would assist the Tripredacus, and I will not fail.

He starts running towards the base.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Eric Bischoff" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> : : Skulletron : :
> 
> Skulletron sees the defense fire coming, and he quickly makes a leap 
behind a boulder.  However, a laser penetrates his thigh.
> 
> Skulletron:  Blast it!
> 
> He checks his leg for mech fluid.  Nothing yet, fortunately.
> 
> Skulletron:  To the slagging pit with the Tripreds!!
> 
> He quickly pops up from the boulder and fires another missile, and 
goes back down.
